title.rendered: Sandbourne Santa Monica, Ocean Avenue’s Beachfront Jewel, Is Now Open

content.rendered:
The serene, oasis hotel balances the sea and the sand with urban vibrancy

SANTA MONICA, Calif., May 30, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — The much-anticipated Sandbourne Santa Monica officially opens its doors, introducing a transformative hotel experience along the vibrant Ocean Avenue. This new beachfront masterpiece, designed by the acclaimed Icelandic architect Gulla Jónsdóttir, offers a unique 175-room coastal retreat that promises to revitalize the upscale hotel landscape in Santa Monica. With an emphasis on engaging all five senses, the hotel is a harmonious blend of natural textures, sculptural elements, indoor and outdoor vibes, and Earth tones throughout.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/sandbourne-santa-monica-ocean-avenues-beachfront-jewel-is-now-open-302160138.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
